thread.title: A Better Strategy for Claiming Social Security
thread.title_full: A Better Strategy for Claiming Social Security - WSJ

author: Alex Coppola
title: A Better Strategy for Claiming Social Security
text:
A married couple was approaching retirement age and facing a number of major financial decisions.
Before their annual meeting with Jason Hill, founder and president of Client Focused Advisors LLC in New York, they shared one of those decisions with their adviser. That year, when they turned 66, their full retirement age for Social Security, the husband and wife both planned to start their benefits but continue to work. They would use...
